item.title: My First Hugo Post
item.author: contact@lifeofdan.me (Dan)
item.description: This is my first post using Hugo. I heard about it while watching “Linux Thursday” which is one of the shows on The Lunduke Show. They said it was faster and simpler than Jekyll, which is what I have been using. I had just spend most of the day yesterday setting up my Jekyll site and while I like Jekyll I am wondering if there is something a bit more streamlined.
